imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern e-commerce hero background with subtle geometric patterns in warm professional tones (hero-bg.dim_1200x600.png)
- Simple package box icon for products section (package-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Delivery truck icon for orders section (truck-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog system where users can browse and search products available for drop shipping, including product name, description, supplier information, wholesale price, and suggested retail price
Implement order management functionality allowing users to create, track, and manage customer orders with order status tracking (pending, processing, shipped, delivered)
Build a supplier management interface to add, edit, and view supplier information including name, contact details, and associated products
Create a dashboard displaying key metrics including total products, active orders, pending orders, and total revenue
Implement profit calculation showing the difference between wholesale and retail prices for each product and order

Design a modern, professional interface with a clean visual theme that conveys trust and efficiency for e-commerce business management, using a sophisticated color palette (avoid blue and purple) with clear typography and intuitive navigation
